basics.name: Zachary McKenna
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Zack hails from Philadelphia. He has a background as a Sound/Projection Designer and Engineer in the theater industry, and enjoys rock climbing, biking and board games.

work.name: Comcast
work.description: Comcast Corporation is a global media and technology company with two primary businesses: Comcast Cable and NBCUniversal. Comcast Cable is one of the United States' largest video, high-speed Internet, and phone providers to residential customers under the XFINITY brand, and also provides these services to businesses.
work.summary: Built and created applications to help engineers manage Comcast's network infrastructure.
highlights: Built a serverless application that runs tests on all modems in Comcast's network to determine Docsis 3.1 capabilities and identify potential network interference.
Built an automation tool/API to automate the process of generating infrastructure in Sunbird DCIM.
Created robust integration tests to run daily and ensure iHat was running as intended.

work.name: Prosoft Clinical
work.description: Prosoft Clinical is a full service contract research organization available to design, conduct, analyze, and report your clinical study.
work.summary: Worked on a digital document input overlay engine in order to allow digital data input for PDF documents.
highlights: Built out the interface for users to overlay html inputs over pre-existing PDF documents.
Required complex x/y positioning and scaling code to ensure that inputs scaled correctly with document when windows were resized.
Handled complicated application state in Vue to keep track of a large amount of inputs and input conditions.

work.name: Zero Projects
work.summary: Developed an API for a client in order to consolidate, store and organize social media data for clients.
highlights: Created a workflow to pull data from Twitter, Facebook and Instagam API's, cache/organize it, and present it to the frontend developer.
Generated data points and analytics from the data, such as correlating page views and likes with frequency of posts.

work.name: Urality
work.description: Urality is a content management and delivery platform tailored to communities and downtowns that integrates rich media with location-based tagging, personalization filtering, and media collaboration with attribution.
work.summary: Worked on the frontend React client. Focused on optimizing load and rendering times. Converted designs from UX/UI engineer to code.
highlights: Optimized and fixed issues related to misuse of React hooks and rendering lifecycle.
Handled tickets related to React client.
Converted website from a slow Wordpress site to a speedy Gatsby site delivered via CDN using Netlify. So fast!

awards.title: KCACTF National Award In Sound Design
awards.summary: Award for sound design and music compositon for Alive!

publications.name: Simplifying Step Functions
publications.summary: Simplifying AWS Step Functions using SST and AWS CDK

projects.name: iHat
highlights: Handled jobs for all modems connected to the Comcast network
Scaled from small batches of jobs in development to hundreds of thousands in production within a year.
Built using AWS serverless services for scalability, speed and costs efficiency

projects.name: DC Track Automation
projects.description: Application for automating inventory management in Sunbird DCIM
highlights: Dynamic GraphQL Schema that can add new mutations automcatially based on S3 file contents.
Automates 20+ points of manual data entry per device created.
